fieldUpdates.formula: 'Phone: '& If(Phone_DNC_Contactable__c,'Contactable','Not contactable')&' - '&IF(!ISBLANK(Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'Washed @'&TEXT(Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'No washed date')&BR()& 'Mobile: '&If( Mobile_DNC_Contactable__c ,'Contactable','Not contactable')&' - '&IF(!ISBLANK(Mobile_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'Washed @'&TEXT(Mobile_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'No washed date')&BR()& 'Home Phone: '&If( Home_Phone_DNC_Contactable__c ,'Contactable','Not contactable')&' - '&IF(!ISBLANK(Home_Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'Washed @'&TEXT(Home_Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'No washed date')&BR()& 'Other Phone: '&If( Other_Phone_DNC_Contactable__c ,'Contactable','Not contactable')&' - '&IF(!ISBLANK(Other_Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'Washed @'&TEXT(Other_Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'No washed date')&BR()& 'Assist. Phone: '&If( AssistantPhone_DNC_Contactable__c ,'Contactable','Not contactable')&' - '&IF(!ISBLANK(AssistantPhone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'Washed @'&TEXT(AssistantPhone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),'No washed date')

rules.description:
DPID is removed as user has entered address which is not validated by DataSan.
ie. Within Console the standard 'edit' button; Datasan does not work here.
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(MailingCity), ISCHANGED(MailingCountry), ISCHANGED(MailingState), ISCHANGED(MailingStreet), ISCHANGED(MailingPostalCode) ), PRIORVALUE(DPID_Primary_Address__c)=DPID_Primary_Address__c )

rules.description:
DPID is removed as user has entered address which is not validated by DataSan.
ie. Within Console the standard 'edit' button; Datasan does not work here.
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(OtherCity), ISCHANGED(OtherCountry), ISCHANGED(OtherState), ISCHANGED(OtherStreet), ISCHANGED(OtherPostalCode) ), PRIORVALUE(DPID_Secondary_Address__c)=DPID_Secondary_Address__c )

rules.description: Automatically untick Email Invalid field when Email Invalid is set to 'True' and Email is changed on a Contact.

rules.fullName: Ctc Copy DPID from Account PRI
rules.description: Copy DPID if address of contact = address of account. Cannot use custom links
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(MailingCity), ISCHANGED(MailingCountry), ISCHANGED(MailingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(MailingState), ISCHANGED(MailingStreet) ), Account.BillingCity = MailingCity, Account.BillingCountry = MailingCountry, Account.BillingPostalCode = MailingPostalCode, Account.BillingState = MailingState, Account.BillingStreet = MailingStreet, DPID_Primary_Address__c = '' )

rules.fullName: Ctc Copy DPID from Account SEC
rules.description: Copy DPID if address of contact = address of account. Cannot use custom links
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(OtherCity), ISCHANGED(OtherCountry), ISCHANGED(OtherPostalCode), ISCHANGED(OtherState), ISCHANGED(OtherStreet) ), Account.ShippingCity = OtherCity, Account.ShippingCountry = OtherCountry, Account.ShippingPostalCode = OtherPostalCode, Account.ShippingState = OtherState, Account.ShippingStreet = OtherStreet, DPID_Secondary_Address__c = '' )

rules.description:
New Contacts during the Digital booking process are marked so that they are not turned Digital automatically (which leads to duplication).
However the User may not turn the Contact to Digital. This allows the automatic routine to fire after 1 hr.

Creates Digital Contact for 'Pending' Contacts. Sends WS message, and sets the Contact to Requested
Contact is Digital 'Pending' when: - Account is made a Digital, its Contacts are set to Digital Status 'Pending'. - new Contact for a Digital Account
rules.formula: AND( /* Account is an active digital account */ Account.Master_Digital_Status__c, /* Contact marked to be converted to Digital */ ISPICKVAL(Digital_Status__c,'Pending'), ISBLANK(AdPoint_Id__c ), NOT(Delay_Digital_Creation__c) )

rules.description:
Moving Digital Contacts to another Account requires deleting the current Adpoint Contact. A Task linked to the Contact is created for the Owner to perform a Delete.
Digital fields are cleared, and It will be turned Digital automatically based on Acct
When a Contact is created under a Digital Account - set it to be turned Digital.
rules.formula: AND( Account.Master_Digital_Status__c, ISBLANK(AdPoint_Id__c), ISPICKVAL(Digital_Status__c, ''), ISPICKVAL( Contact_Status__c, 'Active'), NOT(Delay_Digital_Creation__c) )

rules.fullName: Ctc Set DNC Status audit field
rules.description: Populate DNC Status audit field for audit purposes
rules.formula: AND(OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(HomePhone),ISCHANGED( Home_Phone_on_DNC__c), ISCHANGED(Home_Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c), ISCHANGED( MobilePhone ),ISCHANGED( Mobile_on_DNC__c ), ISCHANGED( Mobile_DNC_Washed_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( OtherPhone ),ISCHANGED( Other_Phone_on_DNC__c ), ISCHANGED( Other_Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( Phone ),ISCHANGED( Phone_on_DNC__c ), ISCHANGED( Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( AssistantPhone ),ISCHANGED( AssistantPhone_on_DNC__c ), ISCHANGED( AssistantPhone_DNC_Washed_Date__c ) ))

rules.fullName: Ctc Set Marketing Preferences audit field
rules.description: Populate Marketing Channel and Product Preferences field for audit purposes
rules.formula: AND(OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Channel_Opt_In_Email__c ),ISCHANGED( Channel_Opt_In_Phone__c ), ISCHANGED( Channel_Opt_In_SMS__c ), ISCHANGED( Product_Opt_In_Community_Print__c ), ISCHANGED( Product_Opt_In_Digital_Offerings__c ), ISCHANGED( Product_Opt_In_Magazines__c ), ISCHANGED( Product_Opt_In_Metro_Print__c ), ISCHANGED( Product_Opt_In_Regional_Print__c ), ISCHANGED( Product_Opt_In_Seminars_Events__c ) ))

rules.description: Update an digital contact
rules.formula: AND( Account.Master_Digital_Status__c, /* Contact is an active digital Contact */ ISPICKVAL(Digital_Status__c , 'Active'), NOT(ISBLANK( AdPoint_Id__c )), OR( ISCHANGED(AccountId) , ISCHANGED(Email) , ISCHANGED(Fax) , ISCHANGED(FirstName) , ISCHANGED(LastName) , ISCHANGED(MobilePhone) , ISCHANGED(Phone) , ISCHANGED(Salutation) , ISCHANGED(Title) /* CATEGORY HERE */ ) )
